document_name: http://www.ug.undp.org/content/dam/uganda/img/About Uganda/About Uganda/About Uganda/Country Programme Action Plan (CPAP).pdf

outputs.output_descr: Enhancing Adoption Of Climate Smart Agriculture Practices in Uganda'S Farming Systems Project

project_descr: This project will focus on enhancing productivity of land through sustainable land management of soil and water resources, particularly integrating CSA as a climate change adaptation strategy to build climate change resilient societies.
project_title: Enhancing Adoption of Climate Smart Agriculturein Uganda
